About Me

BIOGRAPHY

I'm interested to work in the field of software and web development as a Full-Stack Web Developer. Constantly trying to extend and improve my coding knowledge and skills by taking various courses, exchanging experiences with other developers and building simulations of different projects (websites and apps). Currently working as a Menager of Legal service, with a Law Master Degree, for a firm in the field of publishing industry.

Skills and Experience:

Most experiance with following programming and scripting languages:

- JavaScript(ES6), HTML(HTML5), CSS(CSS3)

Actively using following libraries, frameworks and tehnologies:

- React, Redux, jQuery, Bootstramp, Sass

Also have some knowlage of:

- JAVA, MYSQL

Actively using also:

- GIT, Firebase, Adobe Photoshop, WordPress

- The Institute for Textbooks and Educational Resources -

Expert Associate for Legal Affairs (2012-2019)

Menager of Legal service (2019 - Still working)

Conducting research on relevant laws, regulations, and legal articles, Organizing and maintaining documents in a paper or electronic filing systems, Gathering, arranging legal documents, writing reports and case preparation, Drafting correspondence and legal documents, such as contracts and other legal acts, Representing the company in a court, Anticipating and mitigating potential legal problems involving the company, Gathering, arranging and drafting legal documents for Public Procurement procedures.
I organize work and distribution of business obligations in the legal service of the firm. Gained working discipline, organizational abilities, working under pressure and in cooperation with other people.

- Web developer or freelencer job preparations -

Full-Stack Web Developer (2018 - In process of learning)

Currently trying to improve my coding knowledge and skills by creating various projects for practising and for demonstration of gained skills. Also working on pro bono projects. Constantly connecting with other developers with similar interests for reasons of exchanging experiences, working with them on projects and training cooperation with other coders. In my current job and profession it's constantly needed to corespond and work with other people, so gained skills in that field I will transfer to coding. In pursuit for freelancing jobs and also willing to work for contractors in country and abroad on part-time or full-time jobs and projects.
